      • beforeMockMvcCreated

        public RequestPostProcessor beforeMockMvcCreated(ConfigurableMockMvcBuilder<?> builder,
                                                 WebApplicationContext cxt)
        Description copied from interface: MockMvcConfigurer
        Invoked just before the MockMvc instance is created. Implementations may return a RequestPostProcessor to be applied to every request performed through the created MockMvc instance.
        Specified by:
        beforeMockMvcCreated in interface MockMvcConfigurer
